penance_template:
pug FIX_COMPILE
fence
  bone NOT: ignore the error
  bone NOT: suppress warnings
bark error <- @confession
cali diagnose(error)
elf fix <- suggest_fix(error)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_TEST
fence
  bone NOT: delete the test
  bone NOT: mark as ignored
bark failure <- @confession
cali analyze_failure(failure)
elf fix <- derive_correction(failure)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_RUNTIME
fence
  bone NOT: catch and ignore
  bone NOT: unwrap blindly
bark panic <- @confession
cali trace_cause(panic)
elf fix <- safe_handling(panic)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_LOGIC
fence
  bone NOT: patch symptoms only
bark bug <- @confession
cali understand_intent(bug)
elf fix <- correct_logic(bug)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_SECURITY
fence
  bone NOT: expose secrets
  bone NOT: weaken protection
  bone NOT: bypass validation
bark vulnerability <- @confession
cali assess_threat(vulnerability)
elf fix <- harden(vulnerability)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "Leviticus:${chapter}:${verse}"}
  anchor #security_audit

pug FIX_DEPENDENCY
bark missing <- @confession
cali resolve_deps(missing)
elf fix <- cargo_update(missing)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_FORMAT
bark lint <- @confession
elf fix <- cargo_fmt(lint)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_CLIPPY
bark warning <- @confession
cali analyze_warning(warning)
elf fix <- apply_suggestion(warning)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_DOCS
bark missing <- @confession
cali generate_docs(missing)
biz -> {docs, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_PERF
fence
  bone NOT: premature optimization
bark bottleneck <- @confession
cali profile(bottleneck)
elf fix <- optimize(bottleneck)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_MEMORY
fence
  bone NOT: leak memory
  bone NOT: use after free
bark leak <- @confession
cali trace_allocation(leak)
elf fix <- fix_lifetime(leak)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_CONCURRENCY
fence
  bone NOT: race condition
  bone NOT: deadlock
bark race <- @confession
cali analyze_threads(race)
elf fix <- sync_correctly(race)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_CRYPTO
fence
  bone NOT: roll own crypto
  bone NOT: weak algorithms
  bone NOT: expose keys
bark weakness <- @confession
cali audit_crypto(weakness)
elf fix <- strengthen(weakness)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "Genesis:1:${verse}"}
  anchor #crypto_audit

pug FIX_NETWORK
fence
  bone NOT: trust input
bark issue <- @confession
cali diagnose_network(issue)
elf fix <- repair_connection(issue)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "Job:${chapter}:${verse}"}

pug FIX_IO
fence
  bone NOT: ignore errors
bark failure <- @confession
cali handle_io(failure)
elf fix <- robust_io(failure)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_CONFIG
bark invalid <- @confession
cali validate_config(invalid)
elf fix <- correct_config(invalid)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "${bible_ref}"}

pug FIX_DAEMON
fence
  bone NOT: disable daemon permanently
  bone NOT: weaken security
bark daemon <- @confession
cali restart_daemon(daemon)
elf fix <- heal_daemon(daemon)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "Leviticus:${layer}:${daemon_id}"}
  anchor #daemon_recovery

pug HANDLE_THREAT
fence
  bone NOT: ignore threat
  bone NOT: reduce strike count
bark threat <- @confession
cali assess_threat_level(threat)
elf response <- select_response(threat)
biz -> {response, scripture: "Leviticus:6:${strike}"}
  anchor #threat_response

pug FIX_CHAIN
fence
  bone NOT: forge hash
  bone NOT: skip validation
bark broken <- @confession
cali find_break_point(broken)
elf fix <- rebuild_chain(broken)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "Leviticus:7:1"}
  anchor #chain_repair

pug HANDLE_BREACH
fence
  bone NOT: expose more secrets
  bone NOT: skip rotation
bark breach <- @confession
cali assess_damage(breach)
cali rotate_keys(breach)
elf fix <- reseal_vault(breach)
biz -> {fix, scripture: "Genesis:3:7"}
  anchor #vault_recovery
